explains: adj. 柔软如羽毛的；生有羽毛的

sentences.en: The foliage was soft and feathery.
sentences.cn: 叶子柔软，有如羽毛一般。

sentences.en: Feathery friends rule. Just ask J.
sentences.cn: 谁是长着羽毛的朋友，问问艾尔博就知道了。

sentences.en: Ripples of light green liquor soon began to emerge from the thin, feathery leaf.
sentences.cn: 随即那纤薄柔软的叶子的旁边便冒出了绿色液体的波纹。
